wikitext.*:
<noinclude>用来给{{tl|替换Banner}}使用的插件。</noinclude><includeonly><!--{if !isset($wgWgbanner) || !$wgWgbanner}--><!--{assign var="wgWgbanner" value=true scope="global"}--><script type="text/javascript">
window.RLQ.push(function() {
    $(function () {
        var bannerData = $("#wgbanner")[0].dataset,
            logo = $("body.skin-vector"),
            styleSheet = {
                "background-image": "url(" + bannerData.backgroundImage + ")",
                "background-color": "rgba(255,255,255,0.73)"
            };
        if (bannerData.backgroundSize !== '' && bannerData.backgroundSize !== "false") styleSheet["background-size"] = bannerData.backgroundSize;
        if (/-?\d+px -?\d+px/.test(bannerData.backgroundPosition)) styleSheet["background-position"] = bannerData.backgroundPosition;
        logo.css(styleSheet);
    });
});
</script><!--{/if}--></includeonly>
